pullRequest.title: Create observations for concepts
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently observations are being created for any type of openmrs_entity  such as person, person_identifier, person_address, concept etc .
This results in extra observations being created for events when the latest version of client core is used.
We need to update this to only create an observation when the openmrs_entity is either a concept or is empty/null.

commit.message: Only create observations when openmrs entity is a concept or is empty

nodes.bodyText: Doesn't this assume that the openmrs_entity has to be type concept? It could be empty, right?
Not sure why this needs to be moved to the top. I think each checkbox option can define what its openmrs_entity is - which can be different from the parent.

commit.message: Explicitly check openmrs_entity type is a concept
Test creation of obs for checkboxes
